description.p: Returns an angle in degrees for an angle expressed in radians.
Returns an angle in degrees for an angle expressed in radians.

discussion.p: The Degrees function calculates an angle in degrees for an angle expressed in radians. See also [Radians].

example.caption: Degrees() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Degrees(1.3) AS EXPR1 FROM Products = 74.484513367007
